about: I'm a passionate Flutter developer with a love for creating beautiful and functional mobile applications. I thrive on bringing ideas to life, from concept to deployment. With a strong background in Dart and a keen eye for UI/UX, I specialize in building cross-platform apps that provide a seamless user experience. I am also proficient in Next.js for building performant web applications.

experience.title: Senior Flutter Developer
experience.description: Led the development of a flagship cross-platform mobile application using Flutter, resulting in a 40% increase in user engagement. Mentored junior developers and established best practices for code quality and testing.

experience.title: Mobile App Developer
experience.description: Developed and maintained several iOS and Android applications. Contributed to all phases of the development lifecycle, from initial design to App Store/Play Store submission.

education.description: Graduated with honors. Focused on mobile development and human-computer interaction. President of the Mobile Dev Club.

projects.title: Awesome Chat App
projects.description_short: A real-time chat application built with Flutter and Firebase.
projects.description_long: This project is a full-featured chat application demonstrating real-time messaging, user authentication, and profile management. It uses Firebase for backend services including Firestore for data storage and Firebase Authentication for user management. The UI is crafted to be intuitive and responsive.

projects.title: E-Commerce Store
projects.description_short: A modern e-commerce PWA built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.
projects.description_long: A complete e-commerce solution with product listings, a shopping cart, and a checkout process. Built with Next.js for server-side rendering and static site generation, ensuring fast load times and excellent SEO. Styled with Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive design.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description_short: A simple and elegant task management app to boost productivity.
projects.description_long: This task manager helps users organize their daily tasks with a clean and minimalistic interface. Features include task creation, due dates, priority levels, and project categorization. Built with Flutter for a smooth cross-platform experience.
